Dialogue.Page: Hey, looks like you found a way into my mind, huh? Hope you're liking it alright, most people don't care for zero-g without a suit.
Heh, I hear ya, glad I've got this little spot to hang out on. Now, I assume you didn't come here just for a deeper connection with your time buddy, so was there something that you needed?

DialogueOption.Text: I need to know what Slate's favorite memory is.

Dialogue.Page: Woah, bit of a personal question there, don't you think? Plus, I can't even say that I properly know. I think they told me at one point, but I wasn't really paying attention.
Alright, but only because you're my time buddy. What do I rememberâ€¦ I remember them talking about Feldspar doing something, so I don't think it actually had to do with something Slate did.
Good luck with whatever you're doing! Try not to die too horribly!
